ProductInfo.Features:
2012 New arrival IR CCTV 700TVL Camera
1/3" SONY EXview HAD CCD II; Enhanced Features and Fine Image Processor
Zoom & focus outside adjusting; Suitable for wall & celling installing
Auto Gain Control; Auto Electronic Shutter
Great for Outdoor Surveillance
Camera Specifications: Model G-40WD Pick up Element 1/3" Effio CCD; Effective Picture Elements (H*V) NTSC: 811(H) x 508(V) Sensor area 4.9mm x 3.7mm Horizontal Resolution 700TVL Minimum Illumination 0 Lux (with IR LED ON) Electronic Shutter Auto: 1/60s~1/100,000s S/N Ratio > 50dB Gama 0.45 BLC Auto/SSWDR AGC ON/OFF Lens 2.8~12mm Lens Video Output 1Vpp, 75Ω IR wave length 850mm Power supply DC 12V Power consumption less than 5.0w IR & IR Range: 66x5 IR LEDs, IR Range 196 feet.
25 foot BNC Video & Power Cable
ProductInfo.Name: Professional 1/3" Exview HAD CCD II with Effio-E DSP Devices 700TVL IR Surveillance Security Camera with 25ft BNC Cable & Power Adapter Kit --700 TV lines, 2.8~12mm Varifocal lens, 66 IR LEDs, 196 Feet IR Distance. WDR(Wide Dynamic Range). OSD Menu.
